name: Discord Theme Store Concept
description:
Description:

Currently the only way to get custom themes are through client mods that are against Discord's ToS. What if Discord add custom themes to Discord? It would reduce the number of people who would use client mods. What if Discord also made it where you can share your themes (potentially sell it).


Links:

This idea was from a friend! Have some concept ideas for me to make? Send them over to https://mrjwofficial.glitch.me/concept-form


Check out some of my other concepts and upcoming ones: https://mrjw.glitch.me/concepts


Check out my Twitter. You can get news about my projects and get some teasers: https://twitter.com/MrJWOfficial
